jobTitle: Data Manager Scientist, Web Tool Developer
jobDescription: West Coast Consulting is a Software Technology Consulting firm based out of Orange County.  We have the following position for one of our major clients:  **********PLEASE APPLY DIRECTLY TO THIS POSTING********* Data Management• Following business standards, work with study personnel to create Data Management Plans, which ensure data can be collected and transferred to the Clinical Data Management System according to business standards• Provide study-specific database setup• Programming SAS and/or SQL code for data transformation and loading tasks• Develop data validation checks using SAS and/or SQL programming• Support of statistical analysis and reporting requirements• Support VMRD’s Clinical Data Management Systems• Support, create and enhance our Desktop Tools and Web applications• Support our relational databasesMinimum: • Intermediate to advanced Web application development programming knowledge and SQL (database & dialect) Node.jsWeb dev in Microsoft WindowsSQL ServerData Management experienceProven ability to lead or work on several simultaneous projects or activitiesExcellent written and verbal communication skills are essential including the ability to author technical documentation, provide customer support and training  Thanks & Regards, Pooja Naresh  Resource Manager  Direct – 949 208 1407- provided by Dice  SQL, Node.JS, SAS
